message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AI 

The paper discusses the security concerns related to IoT devices and proposes a solution to reduce the risk by developing formal specifications of the intended purpose of IoT devices. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the development and verification of MUD profiles, which involves software engineering (cs.SE) and system design (cs.SY). Additionally, the paper applies a formal semantic framework, which involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
